title: 【跑酷】MVP PARKOUR|MVP跑酷|欢乐跑酷|1.10.2|BOSS挑战|_Boon
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-12 23:07 编辑 


简介 DescriptionWould you want to play the hardest parkour? Well, here it is!This parkour includes 21 stages, including 2 mid boss stages and 1 final boss stage.There are many blocks, obstacles, and adversities.
你想玩最难的跑酷吗？如果你想，那恭喜你你找到了！这个跑酷含有21关，加上2个中等的BOSS还有一个终极BOSS。此地图有各种方块，障碍。
原作者：_Boon
地图大小：13MB

图片 Pictures











注意事项 Conditions
1.请一定要在1.10.2游玩！
2.不要多人，仅支持单人！




额外信息 ADDITIONAL INFOI think that you take a time of playing parkour for a 5-hours.Challenge the MVP of parkour!!If you play this parkour and upload the video of that, add comment here. I will watch that.If you find a bug or error of map, please send mail to boon95095@gmail.com.
应该要游玩5小时很有挑战！如果你录视频，请在http://www.minecraftmaps.com/parkour-maps/mvp-parkour评论，谢谢。我（原作者）会观看。如果你发现BUG，请发邮件给boon95095@gmail.com.
